data.title: What Made Wonder Egg Priority Such a Special Anime, Part 1
data.description: Wonder Egg Priority is the first anime series created by hit television drama screenwriter, Shinji Nojima. It's an unique show imbued with the passion of its young team of creators. In this special interview, we asked the core staff on the series what made Wonder Egg Priority so outstanding.
data.author: Febri

data.title: The Origins of Attack on Titan with Hajime Isayama and Kawakubo
data.description: We got the story behind the story in this interview with the author and editor of Attack on Titan, Hajime Isayama and Shintarou Kawakubo. From the road to publication, to creating the characters and the titans, this is a can’t-miss read for any AoT fan!
data.author: Febri

data.title: SK8 the Infinity: An interview with Hiroko Utsumi and Akemi Hayashi
data.description: Known for past hits such as Banana Fish, series director Hiroko Utsumi chats with us about her first original anime SK8 the Infinity. Joining her is storyboard and unit director Akemi Hayashi. The two of them share insightful details about episodes 7 and 10 of Winter 2021's fan-favorite, SK∞!
data.author: Febri

data.title: A Manga for Anyone: Nagabe and the Unique Charm of Totsukuni no Shoujo
data.description: Commemorating the manga's final chapter and new anime announcement, creator Nagabe and editor Shinpuku gave an exclusive interview.
data.author: MAL_editing_team
